```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(nycflights13)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(ggthemes)
```

## Data visualization

```{r}
glimpse(penguins)
```

```{r, message=F, fig.width=12, fig.height=8}
penguins |> 
  filter(!is.na(flipper_length_mm) | !is.na(body_mass_g)) |> 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(
    x = flipper_length_mm,
    y = body_mass_g
  )) +
  geom_point(mapping = aes(
    color = species,
    shape = species
  )) +
  geom_smooth(
    method = "lm",
  ) +
  labs(
    title = "Body mass and flipper length",
    subtitle = "Dimensions for Adelie, Chinstrap, and Gentoo Penguins",
    x = "Flipper length (mm)",
    y = "Body mass (g)",
    color = "Species",
    shape = "Species"
  ) +
  scale_color_colorblind()
```

```{r, warning=F, message=F, fig.width=12, fig.height=8}
penguins |> 
  ggplot(mapping = aes(
    x = bill_depth_mm,
    y = bill_length_mm,
    color = species,
    shape = species
  )) + 
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
  labs(
    title = "Bill length (mm) vs Bill depth (mm) for various species of penuins",
    x = "Bill length (mm)",
    y = "Bill depth (mm)",
    color = "Species",
    shape = "Species"
  ) +
  scale_color_colorblind()
```

## `Data tidying`

```{r}
table1 |> 
  mutate(rate = cases / population * 10000)
```

```{r}
table1 |> 
  group_by(year) |> 
  summarize(avg_cases = mean(cases), avg_population = mean(population))
```

```{r}
billboard |> 
  pivot_longer(
    cols = starts_with("wk"),
    names_to = "week",
    values_to = "rank"
  ) |> 
  filter(is.na(rank))
```
